short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Given DOM element returns styles applied to it and all its children.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspect elements and extract the CSS defined for them and their children. The extension is useful if you need to transfer part of one page to another.
